entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Carleton-sur-Mer
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 09:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.8°C
Wind: E 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
